Title: Thin Air (2)
Plot:
While under pressure to discover the truth behind the murder of young Joanna, DCI Boyd (Trevor Eve) slips up and makes possibly some irreversible mistakes.

Joanna's killer begins stalking her sister.
GuestStars: Cherie Lunghi,  Jack Ellis,  Louise Delamere,  George Calil,  Paul Bazely,  Roger Allam,  Ralph Nossek,  Justin Salinger,  Danielle Lyn Saunders,  Gabriella  Saunders,  Justin Shevlin,  Steve Toussaint,  Sophie
